title: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display with ProMotion technology and Always-On. A17 Pro chip with 6-core CPU and 6-core GPU. Pro camera system with 48MP Main, 12MP Ultra Wide, and 12MP Telephoto. Dynamic Island. Titanium design with Ceramic Shield front.

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 3088 x 1440 pixels, 120Hz refresh rate. Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. Quad camera setup with 200MP main sensor. S Pen included. 5000mAh battery with 45W fast charging. Android 14 with One UI 6.1.

title: MacBook Pro 16 (2024)
description: 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display. M3 Max chip with 14-core CPU and 30-core GPU. 32GB unified memory. 1TB SSD storage. Up to 22 hours battery life. Three Thunderbolt 4 ports, HDMI port, SDXC card slot.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise canceling with Auto NC Optimizer. 30-hour battery life with quick charging (3 min charge for 3 hours playback). 8 microphones for superior call quality. Multipoint connection. LDAC codec support. Adaptive Sound Control.

title: iPad Pro 12.9 (2024)
description: 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion and True Tone. M2 chip with 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU. 12MP Wide and 10MP Ultra Wide cameras. LiDAR Scanner. Face ID. USB-C connector with support for Thunderbolt / USB 4.
